QuestData.Title: Testing the Waters
QuestData.Description: There is no place that the Sashj'tar can hide from you now, $n.$B$BThey will not be expecting a direct attack in their waters. This is a perfect opportunity to cut down their commanders.$B$BMeet me in Jandvik after you have slaughtered them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Raz'jira, Malt'his, and Kel'tariss in Azuregale Bay.
QuestData.RewardText: There are sea giants in the bay!?$B$BYou must tell Toryl about this grave news right away.
